vaex.ui.plugin.dispersions module¶

class vaex.ui.plugin.dispersions.DispersionEllipse(xy, width, height, scale=1.0, angle=0.0, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: matplotlib.patches.Patch

This ellipse has it’s center in user coordinates, and the width and height in device coordinates such that is is not deformed
